Package dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.blockmodification

Class BaseBlockModification

java.lang.Object
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.BaseEvent
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.blockmodification.BaseBlockModification
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeepDarkInvasion, GoldRush, IceIsNice, NetherInvasion, SubPlantsToAir, SubPlantsToFire, SubPlantsToSculkInteractive, SubWaterToLava
public abstract class BaseBlockModification extends BaseEvent
Base class for block modification events that handles replacing blocks in specified regions. Provides functionality to modify blocks for all online players using either single blocks or patterns.

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseBlockModification

      public BaseBlockModification(EventClassification classification, String eventName, GenericRegion region, org.bukkit.Material replacementBlock, Collection<com.sk89q.worldedit.world.block.BlockType> blockTypesToReplace, boolean isMaskInverted)
      Constructs a block modification event using a single replacement block.
      Parameters:
      classification - The event classification (POSITIVE, NEGATIVE, or NEUTRAL)
      eventName - The name of the event
      region - The region in which blocks will be modified
      replacementBlock - The material to replace blocks with
      blockTypesToReplace - Collection of block types to be replaced
      isMaskInverted - Whether to invert the block type mask

    • BaseBlockModification

      public BaseBlockModification(EventClassification classification, String eventName, GenericRegion region, com.sk89q.worldedit.function.pattern.Pattern pattern, Collection<com.sk89q.worldedit.world.block.BlockType> blockTypesToReplace, boolean isMaskInverted)
      Constructs a block modification event using a pattern.
      Parameters:
      classification - The event classification (POSITIVE, NEGATIVE, or NEUTRAL)
      eventName - The name of the event
      region - The region in which blocks will be modified
      pattern - The pattern to replace blocks with
      blockTypesToReplace - Collection of block types to be replaced
      isMaskInverted - Whether to invert the block type mask

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(boolean isUsingPattern)
      Executes the block modification event for all players.
      Parameters:
      isUsingPattern - Whether to use pattern-based replacement instead of single block replacement
